sourcesContent:
// import '../styleClass.css'; import '../css/report.css'; import '../css/report2.scss'; import {connect} from 'react-redux' import jsPDF from 'jspdf' import React from 'react' import {myQueries} from '../actions/query.action' import ClimbingBoxLoader from "react-spinners/ClimbingBoxLoader"; class Report extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super() this.state = { loading: false, mechanicalInfo: false } } handleLoading=()=>{ this.setState({loading:true}) setTimeout(()=>{ this.setState({loading:false}) },5000) } jsPDFGenerator=()=>{ var doc = new jsPDF('p','pt'); doc.text(20,30,'General Specifications') doc.text(20,60, `Model: ${this.props.location.specifications.specification.model}`) doc.text(20,90,`Year: ${this.props.location.specifications.specification.year}`) doc.text(20,120,`Make: ${this.props.location.specifications.specification.make}`) doc.text(20,150,`Trim: ${this.props.location.specifications.specification.trim_level}`) doc.text(20,180,`Standard Seating: ${this.props.location.specifications.specification.standard_seating}`) doc.text(20,210,`Fuel Specifications`) doc.text(20,240,`Highway Mileage: ${this.props.location.specifications.specification.highway_mileage}`) doc.text(20,270,`city_mileage: ${this.props.location.specifications.specification.city_mileage}`) doc.text(20,300,`Tank size: ${this.props.location.specifications.specification.tank_size}`) doc.text(20,330,'Mechanical ') doc.text(20,360,`Anti Brake System: ${this.props.location.specifications.specification.anti_brake_system}`) doc.text(20,390,`Transmission: ${this.props.location.specifications.specification.transmission}`) doc.text(20,420,`Type: ${this.props.location.specifications.specification.drive_type}`) doc.text(20,450,`Engine: ${this.props.location.specifications.specification.engine}`) doc.setFont('courier'); // doc.setFontType('normal'); doc.save(`${this.props.location.specifications.specification.make} ${this.props.location.specifications.specification.model} report.pdf`) } loadMyQueries=()=>{ const queriesArray = [] const user = this.props.user.id fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/v1/queries') .then(resp=>resp.json()) .then(data=>{ queriesArray.push(data.filter(query=>query.user_id === user)) this.props.myQueries(queriesArray) }) } goBack=()=>{ this.props.history.push('/newcar') } handleSave=()=>{ const query_id = this.props.queryId const newObj ={ method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ car: {query_id: query_id, vin_number:this.props.location.specifications.specification.vin, anti_brake_system:this.props.location.specifications.specification.anti_brake_system, city_mileage:this.props.location.specifications.specification.city_mileage, drive_type:this.props.location.specifications.specification.drive_type, engine:this.props.location.specifications.specification.engine, highway_mileage:this.props.location.specifications.specification.highway_mileage, make:this.props.location.specifications.specification.make, model:this.props.location.specifications.specification.model, standard_seating:this.props.location.specifications.specification.standard_seating, tank_size:this.props.location.specifications.specification.tank_size, transmission:this.props.location.specifications.specification.transmission, trim_level:this.props.location.specifications.specification.trim_level, year:this.props.location.specifications.specification.year } }) } fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/v1/cars', newObj ) .then(resp => resp.json()) .then(q=> { this.handleLoading() this.loadMyQueries() }) } render(){ return (
{!this.state.loading?
: " " }
{!this.state.loading?
{this.props.location.specifications?

General specifications

Model: {this.props.location.specifications.specification.model}

Year: {this.props.location.specifications.specification.year}

Make: {this.props.location.specifications.specification.make}

Trim: {this.props.location.specifications.specification.trim_level}

Standard Seating: {this.props.location.specifications.specification.standard_seating}

{/* Read More */}

Fuel efficiency

Highway Mileage: {this.props.location.specifications.specification.highway_mileage}

City Mileage: {this.props.location.specifications.specification.city_mileage}

Tank size: {this.props.location.specifications.specification.tank_size}

{/* Read More */}
{/* */}

Mechanical info

Brake System: {this.props.location.specifications.specification.anti_brake_system}

Transmission: {this.props.location.specifications.specification.transmission}

Type: {this.props.location.specifications.specification.drive_type}

Engine: {this.props.location.specifications.specification.engine}

{/* this.setState({mechanicalInfo: true})}>Read More */}
{this.props.location.carHistory.length !==0 ?

Last Title info

Date: {this.props.location.carHistory.historyInformation[0].TitleIssueDate.Date}

Last state registered: {this.props.location.carHistory.historyInformation[0].TitleIssuingAuthorityName}

Mileage: {this.props.location.carHistory.historyInformation[0].VehicleOdometerReadingMeasure}

Number of titles issued: {this.props.location.carHistory.historyInformation.length}

{/* Read More */}

Ownership Record

Brands record number: {this.props.location.carHistory.brandsRecordCount}

Mileage discrepancy: {this.props.location.carHistory.brandsRecordCount === 0? "No" : "Yes"}

Previous taxi?: {this.props.location.carHistory.brandsRecordCount === "17"? "Yes" : "No"}

Vehicle unsafe to drive record: {this.props.location.carHistory.brandsRecordCount === "41"? "Yes" : "No"}

Recovered or theft: {this.props.location.carHistory.brandsRecordCount === "36"? "Yes" : "No"}

Former rental car?: {this.props.location.carHistory.brandsRecordCount === "48"? "Yes" : "No"}

{/* Read More */}
{/* */}

Accident Record

Flood Damage?: {this.props.location.carHistory.brandsRecordCount === "01" ? "Yes" : "No"}

Fire Damage?: {this.props.location.carHistory.brandsRecordCount === "02"? "Yes" : "No"}

Hail Damage?: {this.props.location.carHistory.brandsRecordCount === "03"? "Yes" : "No"}

Big damage for collision: {this.props.location.carHistory.brandsRecordCount === "14"? "Yes" : "No"}

{/* this.setState({mechanicalInfo: true})}>Read More */}
: " " } {this.props.location.marketValue.length !==0?

Market Price

Suggested Price: ${this.props.location.marketValue.adjustedCleanRetail}

Avg Retail Purchase: ${this.props.location.marketValue.adjustedAverageTrade}

Market Condition

Average Mileage: {this.props.location.marketValue.averageMileage}

Max Mileage Adj: {this.props.location.marketValue.maxMileageAdj}

{/* Read More */}
: " " }
: this.props.history.push('/newquery') }
: }
) } } const mapStateToProps = (state)=>{ return { user: state.userData, queryId: state.carData } } const mapDispatchToProps = { myQueries } export default connect (mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Report)
